title: How to Destroy the White Moonlight Image - Novel Updates

description:
The Overbearing Little Horse s*ave’s White Moonlight Goddess

After saving the little horse s*ave, I climbed up the status and married the prince. The overbearing little horse s*ave came back and pressed me onto the dragon chair.

Overbearing little horse s*ave: So? Didn’t you like this dragon chair?

Su BaiYue: QAQ

Big Brother, why don’t you let me go.>
